name: Super Goal - Soccer Stickman
description:
Draw a line to kick the ball. The direction and route of the ball are completely controlled by you. Use your wisdom to solve puzzles and score top notch goals!

If you want to play a stickman soccer game, this epic 3D soccer game 2022 is your best choice. It is also an offline game that can be played without the Internet. Mini, simple, you can play anytime and anywhere you want.

Your soccer stickman can strike the ball with head, feet, and back. In addition, offside and tackle fouls are also allowed in our crazy soccer game. No restrictions, free to kick. Are you ready to battle and become hero in the match?

You will collect gold coins and keys in the level, which are important items. They will be used to unlock new ball skins and characters. Collect as many as you can, using any crazy method you can think of.

This stickman style sports games’simple yet changeable gameplay with exquisite graphics will bring you top kicking enjoyment! A perfect game for the whole family. As a time-killer, it is undoubtedly the best choice!


GAME FEATURES
AI controlled 3D environment.
- In multiplayer matches, players are controlled by highly intelligent game AI.

Unique gameplay.
- Not just an eleven-a-side football game. You will face the clashes of players in the league, you will encounter various obstacles in training, and you will get a lot of gold coins in bonus levels.

You do you!
- Superhero, ninja, king, master, cowboy, gentlemen, manager, and many other roles are for you to choose from.

Makeover
- Dress up yourself as much as you like. Change skins, color and kits to be what you want to be.

Iconic Stadium Venues
- A variety of scenes available. Romantic beach soccer, crowded city soccer, street soccer, mountain soccer and other styles of stadiums you will experience one by one.

Not just football
- In addition to kicking a football, you can also kick basketball, tennis, volleyball, golf, billiards, rugby, and even fun fruit balls, candy balls and animal balls, etc.

Best goal celebrations
- Celebrate happily. After you score a super goal in a match, make arrogant moves around your opponents, and they will even cooperate with you to make crazy celebration moves! Isn't it fun?


Super Goal is a mini war full of clashes. It’s survival of the strongest and you are the hero! Control your stickman to clash and score goals! Download it now!

This is all just the beginning, in order to make a top stickman football game, we project to include many new updates. More levels and characters are coming!

We are looking forward to getting feedback from all of you! Your reviews will be our main reference for improving and perfecting this football game.
